definition: threshing floor/classifier for events and happenings: spell, episode, bout
large place used for a specific purpose/stage/scene (of a play)/classifier for sporting or recreational activities/classifier for number of exams

sentences.english: Cyndi continued to play local clubs, but this time as a solo artist.
sentences.chinese: 她又继续游走于小型娱乐场所，这次却是她一个人。

sentences.english: There are also east and west wings and the stage for entertainment.
sentences.chinese: 围内也设东西厢房，还有戏台等娱乐场所。

sentences.english: The main entertainment venue was a tent labeled “Asian Fusions,” and Nash explained that “we’re trying to dispel the myth that we are a monolithic community in any sense.
sentences.chinese: 主要娱乐场所是一顶称作“亚洲融合”的大篷。

sentences.english: The company already owns the City of Dreams gaming resort in Macau.
sentences.chinese: 公司已经拥有了澳门的新濠天地娱乐场。

sentences.english: The outer harbour site will be cleared before the end of this year, and restructured for a new casino project - "Oceanus".
sentences.chinese: 新八佰伴原址于下半年改为海洋之神娱乐场项目。

sentences.english: Entertainment places have been important places where contemporary argots are spread.
sentences.chinese: 娱乐场所已成为当代隐语传播的重要场合。

sentences.english: The other included the large bookstores and public places of entertainment.
sentences.chinese: 二是大规模的书肆和大型娱乐场所的存在。

sentences.english: Don't go to the disreputable place of entertainment.
sentences.chinese: 不要去那种名声不好的娱乐场所。

sentences.english: Provide courteous customer services to all members and non-members in casino.
sentences.chinese: 为娱乐场会员或非会员提供优质谘询服务。

sentences.english: The surrounding neighborhood offers easy access to schools, shopping and entertainment.
sentences.chinese: 周围环境离学校，商店，娱乐场所很近。

sentences.english: It has animated gameplay, voice-overs and realistic casino-style action.
sentences.chinese: 有生动的游戏，画外音和现场娱乐场风格。

sentences.english: Auckland Airport is a 20-minute drive away.
sentences.chinese: 酒店附近分布有一些商店和娱乐场所。

sentences.english: Who knows the land that this public place of entertainment is dispute however.
sentences.chinese: 谁知这家娱乐场所却是是非之地。

sentences.english: Now it is developing a chain of luxury hotels and resorts.
sentences.chinese: 现在它正开发连锁奢侈酒店和娱乐场。

sentences.english: A wayward bear made his way into a Nevada casino, hoping to try his luck finding some food.
sentences.chinese: 一只顽皮的熊为了觅食进入了内达华州的一间娱乐场。

sentences.english: Floodwaters from the Mississippi River inundate casinos at Tunica, Miss., Monday, May 9, 2011.
sentences.chinese: 密西西比河的洪水淹没了蒂尼卡的娱乐场。

definition: karaoke hall/singing hall (venue for concerts of popular songs)
